content: UTEP Faculty Profiles MinerAlert Skip to main content Search pages and people FACULTY PROFILES X Quick Links Library Parking & Maps UTEP News Events Student Affairs Business Affairs Employment Opportunities University Bookstore Technology Support Main Content UTEP Faculty Profiles UTEP Faculty Profiles Mohammad Saidur Rahman Assistant Professor Computer Science Office Building: Chemistry and Computer Science Building Office Room: 3.1022 Phone: (915) 747-5882 Email: msrahman3@utep.edu Bio Education Scholarly and Creative Activity Grants Courses Course Evaluations Bio < Dr. Mohammad Saidur Rahman, Assistant Professor at UTEP, directs the IQSeC Lab, researching machine learning-driven cyber defense, malware detection, network security, and quantum security. > Education < Ph D in Computing and Information Sciences, Rochester Institute of Technology (2024) MS in Cybersecurity, Rochester Institute of Technology (2018) BBA in Management Information Systems (MIS), University of Dhaka (2016) > Publications < CITADEL: A Semi-Supervised Active Learning Framework for Malware Detection Under Continuous Distribution Drift Abstracts of the 34th Joint UTEP/NMSU Workshop on Mathematics, Computer Science, and Computational Science, El Paso, Texas, November 1, 2025 (2025), Md Ahsanul Haque, Ismail Hossain, Suresh Kumar Amalapuram, Vladik Y.
